mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT (status, name, description, price, totalStock, purchasedStock, personalLimitAmount, startDealTime, endDealTime ) VALUES ( #{status}, #{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{totalStock}, #{purchasedStock}, #{personalLimitAmount}, #{startDealTime}, #{endDealTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT status , productId , name , description , price , totalStock , purchasedStock , personalLimitAmount , startDealTime , endDealTime FROM PRODUCT WHERE productId = #{productId}
